title: Part a.
stimulusHtml:
1 point

One point is earned for stating that United States exports to South Korea will increase.
descriptions:
No point earned.

One point is earned for stating that United States exports to South Korea will increase.

Earns 1 of 1 point.

One point is earned for stating that United States exports to South Korea will increase.

title: Part b.
stimulusHtml:
2 points

  • One point is earned for stating that the United States current account will be in surplus.

  • One point is earned for stating that the United States gross domestic product will increase and explaining that higher U.S. exports increase AD (or that production increases to meet the increased export demand from South Korea).
descriptions:
No points earned.

  • One point is earned for stating that the United States current account will be in surplus.

  • One point is earned for stating that the United States gross domestic product will increase and explaining that higher U.S. exports increase AD (or that production increases to meet the increased export demand from South Korea).

Earns 1 of 2 points.

  • One point is earned for stating that the United States current account will be in surplus.

  • One point is earned for stating that the United States gross domestic product will increase and explaining that higher U.S. exports increase AD (or that production increases to meet the increased export demand from South Korea).

Earns 2 of 2 points.

  • One point is earned for stating that the United States current account will be in surplus.

  • One point is earned for stating that the United States gross domestic product will increase and explaining that higher U.S. exports increase AD (or that production increases to meet the increased export demand from South Korea).

title: Part c.
stimulusHtml:
2 points

  • One point is earned for drawing a correctly labeled graph of the foreign exchange market for the U.S. dollar.

  • One point is earned for shifting the demand curve for the dollar to the right (and/or shifting the supply curve to the left) and showing an increase in the won price per dollar.
descriptions:

  • One point is earned for drawing a correctly labeled graph of the foreign exchange market for the U.S. dollar.

  • One point is earned for shifting the demand curve for the dollar to the right (and/or shifting the supply curve to the left) and showing an increase in the won price per dollar.

  • One point is earned for shifting the demand curve for the dollar to the right (and/or shifting the supply curve to the left) and showing an increase in the won price per dollar.

Earns 2 of 2 points.

  • One point is earned for drawing a correctly labeled graph of the foreign exchange market for the U.S. dollar.

  • One point is earned for shifting the demand curve for the dollar to the right (and/or shifting the supply curve to the left) and showing an increase in the won price per dollar.
